history.content:
You have to sign up for classes as an undeclared the semester you are taking the last prereq to declare. This is kind of a bummer, but everyone has to deal with it.

As for good starter upperdivs in conjunction with 61C, maybe 168 or 188? They are both pretty low workload, don't require/benefit from much 61C knowledge, so those are what I would reccomend. 170 is a good thing to take after 70, but is rather high workload with the weekly homeworks.

I am currently taking CS70, and plan to declare CS by the end of the semester. I tried adding 194, and got a notice that I didn't meet the reservation requirements. I tried adding 186, and was unable to because it requires instructor consent. 

I don't know what else to put as my Phase 1 (will I be able to get into ANY upper div CS classes?). The other classes I plan to take are EE16A and CS61C. I was looking for an upper div that was not too work-heavy. Does anyone have any suggestions/advice?

Thank You!
history.subject: How to add upper division courses without having declared CS?
